title: Cassiopeia twin fang bug? Please help!
body:
Hello, 
I have recently been playing Cassiopeia and i am experiencing a bug with her e. It seems every time i cast twin fang when my character is stationary, it directs me and moves me towards the enemy fountain. It doesn't matter where i am on the map, it will always move me towards the enemy fountain ONLY if my character is still, if i am moving around it will cast the ability normally, how it should. I don't know if this is something on my end, or some setting i am not aware with. I haven't seen any other players report this so I'm assuming its not a bug, but please give me any tips or anything you could recommend so  i can play cassio without the frustration of movement control loss. 

Thanks,

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds really odd.
To rule out any possible corruption with any game assets could you please [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.

Thanks for the reply!
OK, so I did a client repair, loaded into a custom game and it still appears to direct me towards the enemy fountain upon casting the twin fang, no other ability, no other champion, only with Cassio's e. Any other suggestions?

I said the same thing again because this time i clicked reply, maybe it would grab your attention =)
That's really weird, I'm going to defer you to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) as I'm not aware of anything that could be causing this.
OK, thanks a lot for the help!
Sorry I couldn't be of further assistance.

Thanks for the reply! 
OK, so I did a client repair, loaded into a custom game and it still appears to direct me towards the enemy fountain upon casting the twin fang, no other ability, no other champion, only with Cassio's e. Any other suggestions?
